lead_paragraph: A U.S. senator is urging the Obama administration to ease restrictions on investment in Cuba so American hotels can operate in the island nation.

headline.main: Senator Urges Rule Changes So US Hotels Can Operate in Cuba
headline.print_headline: Senator Urges Rule Changes So US Hotels Can Operate in Cuba

snippet: A U.S. senator is urging the Obama administration to ease restrictions on investment in Cuba so American hotels can operate in the island nation.
